data.eml:eml: A new genus and species of Macrosiphini (Hemiptera, Aphididae) from China, living on Isodon eriocalyx

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Bin, Lou, Ya-Meng, Qiao, Ge-Xia (2013): A new genus and species of Macrosiphini (Hemiptera, Aphididae) from China, living on Isodon eriocalyx. ZooKeys 359: 1-12, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.359.6219, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.359.6219
